nodes.text: my opinion, their banning a gun because of the way it looks they seem to think an ak47 is worse than a regular gun because it looks like a military gun the only true (assault weapon) is fully automatic i have. sereral ak47s but their semi -auto thats not an assault weapon!

I think you have your image of an assault weapon slightly skewed. an assault weapon by its very name is a weapon designed to harm another human. this does not mean full auto it just means that it was never designed to be a target/hunting/self defense weapon.

Actually you are incorrect. The most commonly used rifles on the competition circuit are so-called 'assault weapons'. The 'assault weapon' moniker is a term just recently fashioned to describe a military looking weapon. There are several target competitions designed solely for these types of rifles.
